message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very beneficial for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable.  Could you do $11,500?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
